short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track whether your emails. Receive notifications when your emails are read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track if your emails are opened. Be notified when your emails are read with our Email Tracking extension.

Mailboy enables you to track the emails you send using Gmail. With Mailboy, you can know when your emails are opened.

Mailboy is a free email tracking service for Gmail.

★ Full integrated to Gmail, Mailboy appears in 2 different places in your account:

- In the composition window, to activate the tracking or not when you compose a new email
- In the list of threads with Mailboy icons to let you see which emails have been read or not.

★ Privacy-friendly email tracking platform

- We don't read your emails
- We don't know who your recipients are
- We don’t store IP addresses
- We don't share your data with third parties
- We don’t manage or delete your emails

★ Doesn't read or store your emails

To work, Mailboy only needs to store identification numbers for the tracked emails. Unlike many other tools, Mailboy doesn’t require permission to read and manage your emails in Gmail.

★ How does email tracking work?

Mailboy adds an invisible image to your emails. This image is loaded when the email is opened by the recipient and allows you to be informed.
